Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System - GN Ceftaroline
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System - GN Ceftaroline panel for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram negative bacteria using broth microdilution.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro rapid identification and quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC) of most Gram negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria using BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System.
